articles.title: Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance with Participants of WPK Cell Chairs Conference
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Enjoys Art Performance with Participants of WPK Cell Chairs Conference
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory performance of the State Merited Chorus and the Moranbong Band was given here on Friday for the participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un enjoyed the performance together with the participants in the conference.
					
					 The numbers of the performance included light music and serial songs "We Have Great Party", female vocal solo and pangchang "The Party Is My Mother" and male solo and chorus "Fly High, Our Party Flag".
					
					 The performers made epic and impressive depiction of the glorious path covered by the WPK.
					
					 They vividly represented the Korean army and people's deep reverence and trust in their Supreme Leader who guides the revolutionary cause of Juche always along the road of victory by glorifying the WPK as the glorious Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party and developing it into the ever-victorious staff of the revolution deeply rooted among the popular masses.
					
					 The performance showed the iron faith and will of the Korean army and people to vigorously advance along the road of the Juche revolution for the final victory of socialism under the guidance of the Supreme Leader.
					
					 At the end of the performance, the audience broke into thunderous cheers of "hurrah!" in token of their reverence for the Supreme Leader.
					
					 Kim Jong Un expressed the belief that the party cell chairpersons would fulfill their mission and duty as primary political workers of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist party in strengthening our Party organizationally and ideologically and promoting the revolutionary cause of Juche, the socialist cause. 
					
					 Among the audience were Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau and vice-chairman of the WPK Central Committee, Pak Kwang Ho, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok, Kim Yo Jong and other leading party officials in Pyongyang and provinces.

articles.title: Dancing Parties Held
articles.content:
Dancing Parties Held
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Dancing parties of youth and students were held in different parts of the country on Saturday, the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					Dancing venues in Pyongyang including the plaza of the Arch of Triumph turned into the sea of dancers amid the playing of song "Glory to General Kim Jong Un".
					
					The participants danced, extending the greatest glory and warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un who is turning the DPRK into the single-minded politico-ideological power and matchless military power and youth power without an equal in the world with his outstanding and tested guidance.
					
					They danced to the tune of song "Cheers of the People" with conviction that the socialist cause of Juche would make a long drive as they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					"Song of Youth" and other songs added to the atmosphere of the dancing parties.
					
					There were similar dancing parties in provincial seats, cities and counties.

articles.title: Korean Women's Dancing Party Held
articles.content:
Korean Women's Dancing Party Held
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- A dancing party of officials and members of the women's union was held at the plaza of the Monument to Party Founding on Saturday, the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Dance began with song "Glory to General Kim Jong Un".
					
					 The participants danced offering an everlasting glory to the respected Supreme Leader who developed the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary armed forces and is making the glorious history of victory of socialism.
					
					 Singing "I Will Live like a Star Following the Party" and other songs, they passionately danced, determined to proactively contribute to building a powerful socialist nation as befitting the women revolutionaries pushing one of the two wheels of the revolutionary chariot.
					
					 Lilting songs including "Sea of Apples at Foot of Chol Pass" revved up the atmosphere of the dancing party.

articles.title: Art Performances
articles.content:
Art Performances 
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- There took place art performances in Pyongyang and provinces to mark the 6th anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 A concert was given by the National Symphony Orchestra at the Moranbong Theatre in Pyongyang.
					
					 The performers sang the praise of Kim Jong Un, who is building the best power in the world to be envied by the world on this land while adding eternal luster to the exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il for building a powerful country.
					
					 Drama "Woman Comrade of Mt Paektu" and revolutionary opera "Victory of the Revolution Is in Sight" were staged at the National Theatre and the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					 A dance suite "My Golden Country" given at the Ponghwa Art Theatre vividly represented the appearance of the country where the people's dream and ideal are being translated into reality under the guidance of the respected Supreme Leader.
					
					 Physical acrobatics "Fliers", illusionary jugglery and interactive jugglery were given at the Pyongyang Circus Theater and the jugglery theatre of the National Acrobatic Troupe. They gave the working people and school children great optimism and joy.
					
					 Colorful numbers were put on stages in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong, South Hwanghae, North Hwanghae, Kangwon and other provinces.
					
					 A music and dance performance was given by teachers and students of the Sinuiju Conservatory in North Phyongan Province.

articles.title: No Force Can Prevail over Independence and Justice: KCNA's Detailed Report
articles.content:
No Force Can Prevail over Independence and Justice: KCNA's Detailed Report
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Korean Central News Agency released a detailed report on the situation of the Korean peninsula this year.
					The main contents of the report are as follows:
					
					The situation of the Korean peninsula is an epitome of the world political situation.
					
					The Trump administration, which set the solution of the nuclear issue of the DPRK as a primary task of its diplomacy and security policy and its DPRK policy as "maximum pressure and engagement," has resorted to the hard-line hostile policy toward the DPRK, the degree of which dwarfs the policies of the former administrations, openly talking that "approach to the DPRK precisely means preemptive strike."
					
					So the international community focused its attention to the Korean peninsula from the outset of the year.
					
					Our party and state, indicating the path to be covered by socialist Korea in the new year, clarified the principled stand that it would continue bolstering the capabilities for self-defense and preemptive attack with the nuclear force as the pivot as long as the U.S. and its vassal forces persist in nuclear threat and blackmail and war drills under the mask of annual ones at the doorstep of the DPRK.
					
					On February 12 the DPRK successfully test-fired the new type strategic weapon system Pukguksong-2, ground-to-ground intermediate-range strategic ballistic rocket.
					
					On March 18, it succeeded at once in the on-the-ground test of the Korean-style new type high-thrust engine, which heralded the birth of the Juche-based rocket industry and declared the establishment of eternal foundation for rounding off the state nuclear force.
					
					On July 4 and 28, it successfully test-fired ICBM Hwasong-14 capable of striking the heart of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. cooked up new sanctions acts against the DPRK and spearheaded the adoption of the UN "sanctions resolutions" one after another against the DPRK. Amid the spreading of the story about "war in August" along with such belligerent remarks as "preventive war" and "preemptive attack", Trump said "north Korea will be faced with fire and fury" and "if a war breaks out, it will be fought on the Korean peninsula and if thousands die, it will also be on the peninsula."
					
					The DPRK's perfect success in the ICBM-ready H-bomb test conducted on September 3 was the greatest victory which put the country on the status of a world-class nuclear power and provided a creditable military guarantee for putting an end to the history of the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmails.
					
					On September 12 the DPRK finished the project for making its medium-range strategic ballistic rocket Hwasong-12 combat-ready, thus clarifying that its final goal is to keep balance of force with the U.S. in actuality.
					
					On September 19 Trump dared cry out for "totally destroying" the DPRK in the UN arena, unheard-of rubbish, only to stun the world public.
					
					The DPRK clarified its toughest countering will to deal with the U.S most ferocious declaration of war with fire surely and definitely.
					
					The Second Plenary Session of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea on October 7 once again clarified the principled stand of our Party and state to preserve the noble mission and nature of the DPRK's nukes which its people gained through a hard struggle and to protect peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region and the rest of the world.
					
					On November 29, the DPRK succeeded in the test-fire of new type ICBM Hwasong-15 reflecting its tremendous might as a world-class military power.
					
					The U.S. persistent moves against the DPRK in political, economic, military, diplomatic and all other fields till the end of this year could not stop even a moment the advance of the DPRK confident in the victory of its cause.
					
					Thanks to Juche Korea which is standing in the outpost for preserving independence, justice and socialism with the nuclear treasured sword of justice, a nuclear war threatening the world was prevented and the desire of mankind for peace preserved.
					
					The DPRK, an undeniable new strategic state and nuclear power of Juche, declares:
					
					Do not expect any change in its policy. Its entity as an invincible power can neither be undermined nor be stamped out.
					
					The DPRK, as a responsible nuclear weapons state, will lead the trend of history to the only road of independence and justice, weathering all tempests on this planet.

articles.title: Papers Praise Kim Jong Un as Iron-willed Commander
articles.content:
Papers Praise Kim Jong Un as Iron-willed Commander
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Leading newspapers on Saturday carry editorials and articles to mark the significant anniversary of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's assumption of supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army.
					 Another peerlessly famous general Kim Jong Un's assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean revolutionary armed forces was the great auspicious event noteworthy in the work to hasten the final victory of the cause of the Juche revolution and usher in the avenue for prosperity of the nation, the papers say.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun in an article praise Kim Jong Un as the iron-willed commander who developed the Korean revolutionary armed forces into the invincible army and turned the Democratic People's Republic of Korea into a world military power with his outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 He is the prominent leader of the nation and peerlessly great man who is hastening the final victory of the cause of independence of the nation by victoriously leading the fierce confrontation with the U.S-led imperialists with his faith of independence and matchless pluck.
					
					 He is the heaven-sent brilliant commander, who is leading the standoff with the U.S.-led imperialists to the final victory with his distinguished military wisdom, commanding art and strong will.
					
					 Minju Joson in an editorial says it is the greatest honor and happiness of the army and people of the DPRK to hold in high esteem Kim Jong Un, peerless hero and great benefactor of the nation, as the supreme commander of the KPA.
					
					 Steadfast is the confidence and will of the army and people of the DPRK to win earlier the final victory of the Juche revolution under his leadership, the paper adds.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Assails Anti-DPRK Action of Japanese Reactionaries
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Assails Anti-DPRK Action of Japanese Reactionaries
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Soon after the UN fabrication of "sanctions resolution" 2397 against the DPRK, Japanese Prime Minister Abe in a news conference said that it is necessary to implement the resolution more strictly so as to force the DPRK to change the policy.
					 Taking advantage of his position as president of the UNSC, Abe in December held UNSC emergency and ministerial meetings, in which he stressed the need for the international community to put maximum pressure on the DPRK, pulling up it over its test-fire of Hwasong-15 and "human rights" issue.
					
					 In this regard Rodong Sinmun Saturday comments that this is no more than a lunatic action taken only by Japan keen on taking issue with others to draw water to its own mill.
					
					 The commentary goes on:
					
					 Japan is the sworn enemy of the Korean nation as Japan has perpetrated such crimes against it that its wounds will never be healed.
					
					 Japan is working hard to realize its militarist ambition, hell-bent on international sanctions and pressure on the DPRK over its nukes of justice, not content with offering its whole territory to the U.S. as a logistic base to carry out the war of aggression against the DPRK. This makes blood boil in the hearts of the Koreans at the thought of Japan.
					
					  The most impudent and vicious Abe forces should no longer be pardoned and the island of Japan be brought to the bottom of the sea. This is the Korean people's bad blood towards Japan. 
					
					 The Japanese authorities should behave themselves, well aware that the heightened resolution of the Korean people to retaliate Japan with the treasured nuclear sword will put it at greater peril.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Dynamic Advance along Road Chosen by Itself This Year
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Dynamic Advance along Road Chosen by Itself This Year
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday says in an article that the service personnel and people of the DPRK are foreseeing rosier future while looking back upon this year with great pride and honor.
					 The article notes that 2017 when humankind greeted with great hope and expectation has not passed uneventfully.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 From the beginning of the year the world fell in the mire of mayhem.
					
					 The U.S. has been engrossed in aggression and interference in sovereign states under the pretext of "anti-terrorism" and "peace-keeping".
					
					 Sovereignties of various countries are violated and many people were drawn into wars and conflicts. Some countries worked hard to keep their security with the help of big powers. However, they failed to check the U.S. infringement on their sovereignties, and conflicts among nations, tribes and sects have still persisted.
					
					 Some countries opted for submission, abandoning their principles before the U.S. high-handed and arbitrary practices.
					
					 Even countries styling themselves big powers chose compromise with the U.S. while thinking about only their immediate interests without their own views, though the latter's practice was wrong.
					
					 Justice was abused in the international arena in line with big powers' interests.
					
					 Under the grim situation only socialist Korea has dynamically advanced along the road chosen by itself without the slightest deviation and smashed the U.S. arbitrary practices.
					
					 In 2018 the world will be further shocked by Juche Korea which will successfully build a powerful socialist nation by giving full rein to the great might of self-reliance and self-development.

articles.title: Nullification of Agreement on Sexual Slavery with Japan Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Nullification of Agreement on Sexual Slavery with Japan Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- According to the south Korean online newspaper Tongil News, the "Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea" and the "New Foundation for Preserving Justice for the Settlement of the Issue of the Sexual Slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army" announced a joint stand on Dec. 28 in demand of the implementation of follow-up measures for nullifying the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 The organizations asserted the nullification of the "agreement" on the issue of the sexual slavery concluded with Japan in December, 2015 as regards the fact that its illegality was disclosed.
					
					 They stressed that the authorities should accept the demand of the victims who have called for just settlement of the above-said issue, adding that the issue should be settled by the standard of human rights under international law.

articles.title: Abrogation of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Called for
articles.content:
Abrogation of "Agreement" on Sexual Slavery Called for
 Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps in south Korea held the 1315th Wednesday Rally outside the Japanese Embassy in Seoul on Dec. 27 to urge the puppet authorities to abrogate the humiliating "agreement" on the sexual slavery with Japan, the south Korean Yonhap News said.
					 At the rally a statement was read out.
					
					 The statement said that the present "government" should nullify the "agreement" on the sexual slavery to keep the commitments of the "presidential election".

articles.title: Brief Biography of Kim Jong Un Introduced in Nigeria
articles.content:
Brief Biography of Kim Jong Un Introduced in Nigeria
Pyongyang, December 30 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism posted on its website the brief biography of leader Kim Jong Il on December 22 on the occasions of the 26th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion con participantes en la V conferencia de presidentes de celulas del partido
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un presencia la funcion con participantes en la V conferencia de presidentes de celulas del partido
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar con solemnidad el dia 29 en esta capital la funcion congratulatoria del Coro Estatal Benemerito y la Banda Moranbong para los participantes en la V Conferencia de los Presidentes de las Celulas del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					  La disfruto el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un junto con los participantes en el conclave.
					
					  En la escena se interpretaron la musica ligera y las canciones en serie "Contamos con el gran partido", el solo y coro masculinos "Flamea alto, la bandera de nuestro Partido" y otras piezas de diferentes generos.
					
					  Los ejecutantes demostraron en escenas epicas la orgullosa trayectoria del PTC.
					
					  Ellos describieron en tono patetico la infinita veneracion y confianza de todos los militares y habitantes coreanos en el Maximo Dirigente quien convirtio el PTC en la gloriosa organizacion kimilsungista-kimjongilista y el estado mayor arraigado en las masas populares, de modo que la causa revolucionaria del Juche avanzara por la senda siempre victoriosa.
					
					  La funcion llego al climax con los programas que reflejaron la conviccion y voluntad de todos los militares y civiles de continuar el camino recorrido en pos del partido tanto en los dias de pruebas como en los gloriosos hasta que se logre la victoria final de la revolucion del Juche y el socialismo.
					
					  Terminado el espectaculo, la audiencia se lleno de las aclamaciones estruendosas al Maximo Dirigente.
					
					  El expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los presidentes de las celulas del partido cumpliran con su mision y deber de funcionarios politicos de base del partido kimilsungista-kimjongilista en fortalecer esta agrupacion en lo ideo-organizativo y llevar adelante la causa revolucionaria del Juche y la socialista.
					
					  Entre los espectadores se distinguian Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico y vicepresidente del CC del PTC, Pak Kwang Ho, Kim Phyong Hae, Thae Jong Su, O Su Yong, An Jong Su, Pak Thae Song, Choe Hwi, Pak Thae Dok, Kim Yo Jong y otros cuadros directivos del partido en el centro y las localidades.

articles.title: ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre la situacion de Peninsula Coreana en 2017
articles.content:
ACNC publica informacion detallada sobre la situacion de Peninsula Coreana en 2017
Pyongyang, 30 de diciembre (ACNC) -- La Agencia Central de Noticias de Corea publico el dia 29 la informacion detallada relativa a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana en el ano 2017.
					Su texto principal va como sigue:
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana es una miniatura de la politica mundial.
					
					La administracion Trump presento la solucion del problema nuclear de Corea como primer punto de su politica diplomatica y de seguridad y definio la politica sobre la RPDC como "maxima presion y compromiso".
					
					Diciendo abiertamente que la "manera de acercamiento a Corea es precisamente el ataque preventivo", ella recurrio a la politica mas intransigente que la mantenida por los ejecutivos antecesores.
					
					Por eso, el enfoque de la sociedad internacional se ha centrado en la Peninsula Coreana desde el principio de este ano.
					
					Al indicar el rumbo de marcha de la Corea socialista para el Ano Nuevo, nuestro Partido y Estado declararon oficialmente su posicion de principios de que mientras EE.UU. y sus seguidores no dejen de ejercer la amenaza y chantaje nucleares sobre la RPDC ni de desarrollar los ejercicios de guerra con la excusa de que es una tradicion efectuarlos anualmente, la RPDC seguira fortaleciendo la capacidad de autodefensa nacional y de ataque preventivo centrada en las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
					
					El 12 de febrero, se realizo con exito el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico tierra-tierra de largo y mediano alcance "Pukguksong-2", nuevo sistema de arma estrategica.
					
					El 18 de marzo, salio exitosa de primer intento la prueba estatica de reaccion del motor de gran capacidad, lo cual anuncio el nuevo nacimiento de la industria coheteril de tipo Juche y la preparacion de solida base para completar las fuerzas armadas nucleares del Estado.
					
					Los dias 4 y 28 de julio, se inyectaron seguidamente en el cielo los ICBM tipo "Hwasong-14" que pueden atacar el corazon de EE.UU.
					
					Se adoptaron una tras otra nuevas leyes de sancion sobre Corea y las "resoluciones de sancion" de la ONU y circularon los chismes como la "guerra preventiva", "ataque preventivo" y "guerra en agosto". En tales circunstancias, Trump disparateo que Corea enfrentara las "llamas y furia" y la "guerra se desatara en la Peninsula Coreana y aunque mueran miles de personas, eso sucedera tambien ahi".
					
					El exito fulminante en la prueba de la bomba H instalable en el ICBM, efectuada el 3 de septiembre, puso a nuestra patria en la primera fila de las potencias nucleares de talla mundial y dio la garantia militar de poner punto final a la historia de chantaje nuclear de los imperialistas yanquis.
					
					El 12 de septiembre, se realizo otra vez el lanzamiento de prueba del cohete balistico estrategico de mediano y largo alcance "Hwasong-12", lo cual insinuo que nuestra meta final es tomar equilibrio real de fuerza con EE.UU.
					
					El 19 de septiembre, Trump se atrevio a pronunciar en el escenario de la ONU el peor disparate de "destruccion total" de nuestro Estado dejando consternada a toda la humanidad.
					
					La Corea del Juche expuso su posicion superintransigente de que respondera sin falta con el fuego a la declaracion de guerra mas brutal de EE.UU.
					
					La segunda sesion plenaria del septimo periodo del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, realizada el 7 de octubre, declaro otra vez la noble mision y caracter de las armas nucleares de la RPDC, conquistadas a cambio de la lucha tenaz del pueblo coreano, y la posicion de principios de nuestro partido y Estado de defender la paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y del resto del orbe.
					
					El 29 de noviembre, se disparo el nuevo ICBM "Hwasong-15" demostrando a todo el mundo la inagotable fuerza de la RPDC, potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					La ofensiva de EE.UU., que no paro hasta el fin de este ano en todos los dominios como politica, economia, plano militar y diplomacia, no pudo detener ni un momento la marcha vigorosa de la RPDC, bien convencida del triunfo de su causa.
					
					Puesto que la Corea del Juche con el medio nuclear de justicia defendio la linea avanzada de defensa de independencia, justicia y socialismo, se previno este ano la guerra nuclear que amenazaba el mundo y se defendio el anhelo de la humanidad sobre la paz.
					
					La RPDC, nuevo Estado estrategico y potencia nuclear del Juche que nadie puede negar, declara asi:
					
					!Que no nos esperen ningun cambio!
					
					La figura sustancial de la Corea poderosa no se puede eliminar ni exterminar.
					
					Como responsable poseedora de armas nucleares, la RPDC conducira la corriente de la historia al unico camino de independencia y justicia frustrando todos los desafios de este planeta.
